headline: Kraft Heinz Canada and Maple Leaf Sports & Entertainment Announce New Partnership, Bringing HEINZ Back to MLSE Venues
summary: TORONTO, October 07, 2025--Today, Kraft Heinz Canada and Maple Leaf Sports & Entertainment (MLSE) announce a new multi-year partnership that brings HEINZ back to MLSE venues for fans. Kicking off this week as the Maple Leafs take the ice for the first game of the NHL season, the partnership brings HEINZ’s iconic lineup back for fans to enjoy and celebrates the brand as the Official Ketchup of the Toronto Maple Leafs and Toronto Raptors, for the 2025-2026 season and beyond.

content.title: Kraft Heinz Canada and Maple Leaf Sports & Entertainment Announce New Partnership, Bringing HEINZ Back to MLSE Venues

thumbnail.caption: New HEINZ condiment stations at Scotiabank Arena with innovative ketchup and mustard taps.

headline: Philadelphia Makes Holiday Hosting Sweeter With Its First-Ever Frozen Cheesecake and New Cinnamon Cream Cheese Frosting
summary: PITTSBURGH & CHICAGO, October 07, 2025--Philadelphia Cream Cheese has secured holiday mainstay status for generations, selling more than 50 million pounds of cream cheese each season.¹ Now, the brand that set the cream cheese standard for over 150 years is bringing magic to this year's seasonal spread in a way only Philadelphia can with two delicious new offerings: Philadelphia Frozen Cheesecake and Cinnamon Cream Cheese Frosting.
